sources.title: Saga of Death Valley (1939)
sources.description: When Tasker kills Roy Rogers he takes one of his young sons. Fifteen years later the other son Roy arrives buying a ranch in the valley where Tasker now controls the water supply. Roy organizes the ranchers for a showdown with Tasker not knowing that his brother is Tasker's chief henchman. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/saga-of-death-valley-1939/

metadata.Plot: When Tasker kills Roy Rogers he takes one of his young sons. Fifteen years later the other son Roy arrives buying a ranch in the valley where Tasker now controls the water supply. Roy organizes the ranchers for a showdown with Tasker not knowing that his brother is Tasker's chief henchman.
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Don 'Red' Barry
